page.title: 09QUESTIONNAIRE SURVEY
page.content: In our survey we found that very few people,only 2.5%,have lived in the village for more than fifteen years.Obviously when the village was first started,in 1968/69,very few people lived here,however it is also known that many of the original villagers have since moved away.On the other hand 30% of our sample have only lived in the village for between six months and two years.This must be because building has been very greatly intensified during the last two or three years.There has always been a constant flow of people moving into the village because of this constant house building.However just as interesting is the constant flow of people moving out of Bar Hill.
